descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod!
It requires all of the DLC.

All containers should be perfectly safe. It contains crafting stations, so it may feel balance unfriendly. Lore wise it is still in tact.

Minor edits include very little terraforming (to prevent clipping) and two deleted fences.


Sovengard's fire is muted because I needed the resource, but to be fair I personally thought it was annoying to constantly hear "CHHHRRRCHHHSSSHHCH" while getting wasted in Nord heaven or hanging out in the woods. This may be fixed, but I need to figure out the sound it makes.

There are multiple safe containers, a vertical book shelf that I personally made using the CK, and various crafting pieces, including:
Alchemy table (namesake), an anvil, sharpening stone, wood chopping block, and a work bench.

Please report any bugs in the comments!

Bethsoft/Bethesda and their amazing creation kit, and TES Alliance for their tutorial on bookshelves.
ENB Used: Tetrachromatic by dptheslothking. I highly recommend it.
author: scott5412
